channel.title: US Federal Government Request For Comments
channel.description: This pulls from a search of the Federal Register to pull requests for comments and make them readable.

item.description:
The FCC seeks public comment on the proposed guidelines for the Emergency Broadband Benefit Program, aimed to support low-income households' broadband access during the pandemic.
COMMENTS_DUE: 25 MAR 2021 More info at:

item.title: Notice of Public Meetings and Request for Comment on the Modernization of Pilot Schools
item.description:
The Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) is soliciting public input on modernizing regulations for pilot schools. The process aims to increase safety, adapt to changes in technology, and create a more effective training environment for pilots which in turn could reduce general aviation fatal accidents. COMMENTS_DUE: 30 May 2025

More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-04-04/html/2025-05795.htm
item.category: Federal Aviation Administration, U.S. Department of Transportation.

item.title: Request for Comment To Withhold Certain Aircraft Registration Information From Public Dissemination
item.description:
The Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) is seeking comments on the impacts of removing certain aircraft registration data from public display on the FAA website. The removal is intended to fulfill section 803 of the FAA Reauthorization Act of 2024, requiring the elimination of private aircraft owner or operator's private information from the FAA's broad display and dissemination.
COMMENTS_DUE: 05 May 2025 More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-04-03/html/2025-05738.htm
item.category: Federal Aviation Administration (FAA), Department of Transportation (DOT).

item.title: Notice of Early Public and Governmental Engagement for Potential Designation of Tribal Energy Access, Southwestern Grid Connector, and Lake Erie-Canada National Interest Electric Transmission Corridors; Reopening of Comment Period
item.description:
The Department of Energy's Grid Deployment Office is reopening the comment period for public input on the consideration of three potential National Interest Electric Transmission Corridors. This includes any potential effects and appropriate methods for future NIETC-specific meetings.
COMMENTS_DUE: 15 APR 2025 More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-04-03/html/2025-05698.htm
item.category: Grid Deployment Office, Department of Energy.

item.title: Proposed Agency Information Collection Activities; Comment Request
item.description:
The Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System is seeking comments on a proposal to extend for three years, without revision, the Investment in Bank Premises Notification (FR 4014; OMB No. 7100-0139).
COMMENTS_DUE: 02 JUN 2025 More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-04-02/html/2025-05644.htm
item.category: Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System.

item.title: Proposed Agency Information Collection Activities; Comment Request
item.description:
The Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System is seeking for public comments related to a proposal to extend for three years without revision, the Recordkeeping and Disclosure Requirements Associated with Regulation H. The regulation pertains to loans secured by real estate located in flood hazard areas.
COMMENTS_DUE: 02 Jun 2025 More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-04-02/html/2025-05647.htm
item.category: Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System.

item.title: Draft Environmental Assessment, Public Hearing, and Request for Comment on the Draft Environmental Assessment, Maximum Economic Recovery, and Fair Market Value for the Freedom Mine Company Proposed Emergency Federal Coal Lease-by-Application and Mining Plan Modification for NDM 111186 and Mining Plan Modification for NDM 091535, Mercer County, ND
item.description:
The Bureau of Land Management is seeking public comment on the draft environmental assessment for the proposed emergency lease of federal coal resources at the Freedom Mine to the Coteau Property Company. Comments are also sought on the proposed modifications to the mining plan and on considerations for fair market value and maximum economic recovery.
COMMENTS_DUE: 02 May 2025 More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-04-02/html/2025-05671.htm

item.title: Agency Information Collection Activities; Submission to the Office of Management and Budget for Review and Approval; Bureau of Reclamation Use Authorization Application
Proposed Extension of Information Collection; Employers' Claim for Reimbursement Assisted Reemployment (AR) Program
item.description:
The Department of Labor is seeking public comment on the proposal to extend the information collection for the Employers' Claim for Reimbursement--Assisted Reemployment Program. This is part of the Labor Department's ongoing efforts to reduce paperwork.
COMMENTS_DUE: 02 JUN 2025 More info at: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-2025-04-02/html/2025-05583.htm
item.category: Office of Workers' Compensation Programs, Labor.

item.title: State of Connecticut: NRC Staff Assessment of a Proposed Agreement Between the Nuclear Regulatory Commission and the State of Connecticut
